long_description: The travel-friendly Kuhl Instagatr shirt resists odors and wrinkles, ensuring you feel fresh while exploring exotic cities or hiking deep into the backcountry. Ionik(TM) polyester microfiber fabric has silver ions woven into the fibers to help prevent unpleasant odors. With a UPF 30 rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Kuhl Instagatr shirt features a left chest pocket with button closure; hidden security pocket keeps sensitive travel documents secure. Closeout.
short_description: The travel-friendly Kuhl Instagatr shirt resists odors and wrinkles, ensuring you feel fresh while exploring exotic cities or hiking deep into the backcountry.
